directions: Halve bell peppers lengthwise, then discard stems and seeds. Put peppers, cut sides down, in 1 layer in an oiled shallow baking pan. Broil 2 inches from heat until charred and softened, 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a bowl. Cover and let steam 15 minutes. Peel.
title: To Tender-Roast Bell Peppers
